FuncDef:
The set card-fault process-mode isolate command enables the global port isolation function.
The undo set card-fault process-mode isolate command disables the global port isolation function.
By default, the global port isolation function is not enabled.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
When detecting a hardware fault during subcard startup, the system prevents the subcard from registering and resets the subcard for automatic fault rectification. If you enable the global port isolation function by running the set card-fault process-mode isolate command, the system isolates only the port corresponding to the faulty component and allows the subcard to directly register after the faulty port is isolated.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
